definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: pl. [[תַּמְרוּרִים]] Je 31:21, doubtful word; sense, and ‖[[חִיֻּנִים ]], require mng. sign-posts (= ´[[תאמ]]: cf. Ar. tuw’muwrun sign-post, √ 0mr v. 0ma0run sign, 0’amarah;un stones (heaped up) as way-mark; Eth. 0amara:0amara: shew, point out, give sign or signal);—Gie rejects strange form, reading [[תִּמׂרִים]] palm-trees, as posts.—1. ´[[ת]]: v. [[מרר]]. p. 601
